title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the refundability of the child tax credit.
content: Fairness for Working Americans Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) eliminate the reduction in the percentage of earned income for calculating the refundable portion of the child tax credit for taxable years beginning before 2005. (2) include in earned income for purposes of calculating the refundable portion of the credit otherwise tax excludable combat zone compensation of members of the armed services. And (3) set forth rules for the tax treatment of certain foreign corporations engaging in tax avoidance activities as US domestic corporations.
